postInstallNotes:
The Apache Spark Mesos Framework has been successfully installed!

	Documentation: https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/running-on-mesos.html
	Issues: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SPARK
preInstallNotes:
Note that the Apache Spark Mesos Framework is beta and there may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation or other discrepancies.
We recommend a minimum of two nodes with at least 2 CPU and 2GB of RAM available for the Spark Service and running a Spark job.
Note: The Spark CLI may take up to 5min to download depending on your connection.
postUninstallNotes: The Apache Spark Mesos Framework has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
name: spark
description: Spark is a fast and general cluster computing system for Big Data
